item.title: Comment on The Fiscal Impact of Low-Skill Immigration by bilbo b.
item.description:
The illegal immigrant who serves empanadas to the economics professor indirectly helps unlock the genius insight that everyone would be better off if everyone lived in America.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/05/the-fiscal-impact-of-low-skill-immigration.html?commentID=160754223
